articles.title: 440-foot asteroid, 4 other space rocks predicted by NASA to pass Earth; Know speed, size and mor - HT Tech
articles.description: 5 asteroids have been predicted to pass Earth at close quarters. NASA has revealed various details about these asteroids such as their speed, size, distance of approach, and more. One is a 440-foot asteroid.
